title: OpenDeck
contents: The original software this project is based on.

title: SvelteKit
contents: The framework used to build the GUI of the app and the website.

title: Bun
contents: The runtime used to build the website.

title: Deno
contents: The runtime used to build the application frontend.

title: Tauri
contents: The framework used to build the desktop application.

title: Rust
contents: The programming language used to build the application backend.
